what: Setup ABM data and basic parameters — setup
title: Setup ABM data and basic parameters — setup
Setup ABM data and basic parameters — setup
code: setup(   demographic_data,   temperature_data,   movement_data = NULL,   demographic_data_MGN = TRUE,   divipola_code = NULL,   disease = "dengue",   incubation_period = 14,   init_infected_humans = 0.005,   init_infected_mosquito = 0.03 )

title: Setup ABM data and basic parameters — setup
text: demographic_data sf object demographic data specified format. expected input user DANE´s MGN (Marco Geoestadístico Nacional). temperature_data Data frame temperature historic. expected input historic data IDEAM´s historic temperature movement_data Data frame movement flow territories. provided automatically calculated demographic data using distance population demographic_data_MGN Boolean stating data directly downloaded MGN needs preparing cleaning divipola_code Divipola code municipality simulated disease Character string disease name. Can either "dengue", "zika" "chikungunya". incubation_period Incubation period disease init_infected_humans Percentage initially infected humans init_infected_mosquito Percentage initially infected mosquitoes
